DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the incidence and evolution over-time of co-morbidities in a general dual-chamber pacemaker population (n=2188 patients) through a 2 years follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: EMERALD - AssEssment of CoMorbidities & Atrial ArRhythmiA Burden in DuaL-Chamber PaceD Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The study will focus on the number of patients moving to persistent Atrial Fibrillation as a function of cumulative %Vp (< or >40%), in a general dual-chamber pacemaker population through a 2 year follow-up (n=2188). The same endpoint will be analyzed in sub populations (Sinus Node Disease and AVB) at 4 years follow up (n=4290).
DOC.criteria: Patient implanted (primoimplant, replacement, upgrade) with dual chamber pacemaker from less than two months or implanted at inclusion. Contraindicated for cardiac pacing, according to the ESC and ACC/AHA/HRS guidelines Permanent or persistent atrial tachyarrhythmia
DOC.keyword: Evaluate the incidence and evolution over-time of co-morbidities
